name: The Cooper Companies, Inc.
description: The Cooper Companies, Inc. is a global medical device company specializing in the vision and women's health sectors. Founded in 1958, Cooper has established itself as a leader in the production of soft contact lenses and innovative surgical products. The company operates through two primary business segments: CooperVision and CooperSurgical. CooperVision is dedicated to providing high-quality contact lenses that enhance the vision of millions of people worldwide, focusing on specialty lenses such as toric, multifocal, and scleral lenses. CooperSurgical, on the other hand, develops a range of products and services in the women's health field, including fertility and gynecological products, aimed at improving women's reproductive health. With a commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction, The Cooper Companies strives to expand its product offerings and reach through strategic acquisitions and partnerships. The company is headquartered in San Ramon, California, and serves customers globally, providing solutions that aim to enhance quality of life and improve health outcomes.
